Class Student

Object
User
Student
public class Student extends User
Entity class representing a Student user.

  • Method Details

    • getYear

      public int getYear()
      Gets the student's year of study.
      Returns:
      The student's year (1-4).

    • getMajor

      public String getMajor()
      Gets the student's major.
      Returns:
      The student's major (e.g., "CS").

    • getSubmittedApplicationIDs

      public List<String> getSubmittedApplicationIDs()
      Gets the list of application IDs submitted by this student.
      Returns:
      The list of application IDs.

    • getAcceptedInternshipID

      public String getAcceptedInternshipID()
      Gets the ID of the application the student has accepted.
      Returns:
      The accepted application ID, or null if none.

    • hasAcceptedInternship

      public boolean hasAcceptedInternship()
      Checks if the student has accepted any internship placement.
      Returns:
      true if an internship is accepted, false otherwise.

    • setYear

      public void setYear(int y)
      Sets the student's year of study.
      Parameters:
      y - The new year of study.

    • setMajor

      public void setMajor(String m)

      Parameters:
      m - The new major.

    • setAcceptedPlacement

      public void setAcceptedPlacement(String appID)
      Sets the student's accepted placement.
      Parameters:
      appID - The application ID of the accepted placement.

    • addApplication

      public boolean addApplication(String appID)
      Adds an application ID to this student's list.
      Parameters:
      appID - The ID to add.
      Returns:
      true if added, false if already present.

    • removeApplication

      public boolean removeApplication(String appID)
      Removes an application ID from this student's list.
      Parameters:
      appID - The ID to remove.
      Returns:
      true if removed, false if not found.
